eller_58 wrote:

> I just downloaded JUnit 3.8.1 from www.junit.org and it doesn't even
> compile in WebSphere!  It looks like someone started to do some
> refactoring and never finished.  The extenstions, framework, and
> runner packages have all been moved under the junit.tests, but the
> import statements and inline references in the code have not been
> updated to match.  Is there a simple solution to this?

I assume you mean WSAD.

I don't think you imported the .jar file correctly. The packages you 
mention are /not/ under junit.tests.

Try importing again and pay special attention to the directory 
structures. Are you importing the source .jar, binary .jar or more?
